duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and maintain IT organization capable of supporting the technology needs of all company functions through appropriate and cost-effective solutions.
Establish and maintain strong working relationships with IT suppliers and maintain knowledge of current technology, equipment, prices, and terms of agreements.
Develop, maintain, and adhere to relevant operating IT budgets.
Represent IT by presenting, explaining, promoting, defining, and negotiating with those within and outside the organization.
Conduct regular system audits to ensure IT compliance with all regulations and requirements.
Maintain and enhance cyber security, data integrity and backup procedures.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in information technology, information systems, computer science or related field (Master’s degree preferred).
